categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Killer" was a clone trooper pilot who served with Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi's fleet during the Clone Wars. He was one of several pilots who used a clone Z-95 starfighter when General Grievous led a Separatist assault on the Republic fleet. Killer was friends with "Engle," a fellow clone trooper pilot, whom he provided covering fire for while Engle performed bombing runs on the Separatist fleet. Killer was shot down and killed during the battle.
Killer wore standard Phase II clone pilot armor that had red markings on the helmet.
